lead_paragraph: Can You Solve This Stumper?You and a friend walk up to a table. You have your eye on one of its two chairs. Your friend sits first. What are the chances you get the seat you wanted?
snippet: This is the first in a four-part series about the art of insight. The topic for today is: simplify
